channel.title: Campervam on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Campervam on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Blu Shakedown Run
item.description:
Took Blu down to Quinton Bay for a shake down run since we completed her internal build earlier in the week.

{{ more }} All went well gas worked so we had tea and coffee, just a matter of being organised with the necessary gear for our travels I think it will require quite a few trips to sort everything out.

Played around with the mythtv it did work, likely need a better aerial or change the tuner.
